ca.uqac.lif.dag

Class NestedNode.CopyCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.dag.Crawler
      • ca.uqac.lif.dag.NestedNode.CopyCrawler
  • Enclosing class:
    NestedNode

    public class NestedNode.CopyCrawler
extends Crawler
    A crawler that creates copies of all visited nodes and connects them in the same way as the originals.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected NodeConnector m_connector
      A connector used to connect nodes.
      protected java.util.Map<Node,Node> m_copies
      A map associating original nodes to their corresponding copy.
      protected boolean m_withState
      Whether node duplication is stateful.

        start - The starting point of the crawl
        connector - A connector used to connect nodes
